content.body: i feel like i missed an announcement

The 129th General Assembly held in Geneva (Switzerland) on 25 June 2025, approved new recognition awards to honour Touradj Ebrahimi, Hyun Kahng, **Robert Palmer** and Michael Saboff for their contributions and services to Ecma.
content.formatted_body: The 129th General Assembly held in Geneva (Switzerland) on 25 June 2025, approved new recognition awards to honour Touradj Ebrahimi, Hyun Kahng, Robert Palmer and Michael Saboff for their contributions and services to Ecma.
